name: Fluff (itch)
description:
Our goal with Fluff is to create an atmospheric platformer where you overcome logical and spatial puzzles to return to your family, from which you were separated. This is an early version that was created through the university module Project in game development I at University of Skövde, in Sweden. 

Since the module finished a few weeks ago, the team has kept working on the project and we're eager to bring major changes to the game in the future. Consider this version a somewhat polished prototype.

Find us at:

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/incidentent
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/IncidentEnt_
